edu.nyu.cs.canvas.model

Class CanvasModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.nyu.cs.canvas.model.CanvasModel

  • public final class CanvasModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class for the Canvas. Model contains entities capturing both geometry and paint properties, and method to manipulate geometry
    Author:
    abhishek
